original_title: The Magic of the Movies: Behind the Scenes of David Fincher's Mank
overview: Join acclaimed director David Fincher, actors Gary Oldman and Amanda Seyfried, and the cast and crew of MANK, for a peek behind the curtain of Netflix's black-and-white ode to Hollywood's Golden Age.
title: The Magic of the Movies: Behind the Scenes of David Fincher's Mank
